quotes.quote: When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You can observe a lot by just watching.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It ain’t over till it’s over.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: It’s like déjà vu all over again.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: No one goes there nowadays, it’s too crowded.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra
